00009 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_currentPositionInitialize )
00010 {
00011         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00012         BOOST_CHECK(node->currentPosition == -1);
00013 }
00014 
00015 //Test for the current position and return value of the sequentialNode. Also check the destructor.
00016 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_simple1 )
00017 {
00018         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00019         AlwaysRunning* ar = new AlwaysRunning();
00020         node->addChild(ar);
00021         int dummy_agent = 0;
00022         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00023         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00024         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_RUNNING);
00025         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00026         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00027         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00028         delete node;
00029 }
00030 
00031 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_simple2 )
00032 {
00033         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00034         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0));
00035         int dummy_agent = 0;
00036         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00037         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00038         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_SUCCESS);
00039         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00040         delete node;

00055 //run it twice to make sure everything gets reset correctly
00056 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_simple4 )
00057 {
00058         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00059         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00060         int dummy_agent = 0;
00061         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00062         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00063         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00064         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00065         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_SUCCESS);
00066         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00067         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00068         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00069         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_SUCCESS);
00070         delete node;
00071 }
00072 
00073 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_cancelInMiddle )
00074 {
00075         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00076         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00077         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00078         int dummy_agent = 0;
00079         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00080         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00081         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00082         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00083         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00084         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 1);
00085         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00086         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00087         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00088         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00089         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00090         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 1);
00091         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_SUCCESS);
00092         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00093         delete node;
00094 }
00095 
00096 //two level sequentialNodes
00097 //only checking correct behavior from the top
00098 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( snt_complex1 )
00099 {
00100         SequentialNode* node = new SequentialNode();
00101         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00102         SequentialNode* top = new SequentialNode();
00103         top->addChild(node);
00104         top->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00105         top->addChild(new FailureAfter(0));
00106 
00107         int dummy_agent = 0;
00108         top->init(&dummy_agent);
00109         for (int i = 0 ; i< 2 ; i++)
00110         {
00111                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->currentPosition, -1);
00112                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_RUNNING);
00113                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->currentPosition, 0);
00114                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_RUNNING);
00115                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->currentPosition, 1);
00116                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_FAILURE);
00117                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(top->currentPosition, -1);
00118         }
00119         delete top;
00120 }
